content: {"name": "First Baptist Church, Soup Kitchen", "alternate_name": "", "description": "COVID-19 Update: Soup Kitchen is still closed due to COVID-19. Food boxes are distributed on Tue and Wed at 12Noon until all boxes are gone. Individuals may walk up or drive up for assistance.SOUP KITCHEN: Offers hot meals to those in need.
